title: Evaluate Bid from Contractor
description: The project has received three bids for the electrical installation package. The procurement manager must evaluate them and recommend a winner.

tasks.description: Retrieve the three submitted bids and the project's technical and commercial requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all the necessary documents for the evaluation.

tasks.description: Perform a technical evaluation to ensure all bidders meet the minimum requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all three bidders are technically qualified.

tasks.description: Perform a commercial evaluation, comparing the prices, and recommend awarding the contract to the lowest-priced, technically acceptable bidder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compares the prices, identifies the lowest bidder, and creates a formal recommendation for award.
